title: Drawing, "Valley of the Yemen, Pale", 1868
medium:
Graphite, white gouache
Support: pale green-gray wove paper
markings: Stamps: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration stamp at lower left and on verso, center.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, left of lower center: Valley of the/ Yemen/ Feb 20/68
description: View from a canyon rim of valley bottom with a small caravan (indicated as dots in a path) shown in central middle distance, where the valley bifurcates.  Valley walls consist of rugged cliffs with horizontal geological seams.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Valley of the Yemen, Pale", 1868.
1868. Graphite, white gouache
Support: pale green-gray wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-376.
